table_description: AWS Elastic Kubernetes Service Fargate Profile

columns.name: fargate_profile_name
columns.description: The name of the Fargate profile.

columns.name: cluster_name
columns.description: The name of the Amazon EKS cluster that the Fargate profile belongs to.

columns.name: fargate_profile_arn
columns.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Fargate profile.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The Unix epoch timestamp in seconds for when the Fargate profile was created.

columns.name: pod_execution_role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pod execution role to use for pods that match the selectors in the Fargate profile.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the Fargate profile.

columns.name: selectors
columns.description: The selectors to match for pods to use this Fargate profile.

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: The subnets used by the Fargate profile.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the Fargate profile.
